function quchong1(arr) {
  const newArr = [];
  arr.reduce((pre, next) => {
    if (!pre.get(next)) {
      pre.set(next, 1);
      newArr.push(next);
    }
    return pre;
  }, new Map());
  return newArr;
}

// \u4F7F\u7528 Set \u53BB\u91CD
function quchong(arr) {
  return [...new Set(arr)];
}

function Animal(name) {
  // \u5C5E\u6027
  this.name = name || "Animal";
  // \u5B9E\u4F8B\u65B9\u6CD5
  this.sleep = function () {
    console.log(this.name + "\u6B63\u5728\u7761\u89C9\uFF01");
  };
}
// \u539F\u578B\u65B9\u6CD5
Animal.prototype.eat = function (food) {
  console.log(this.name + "\u6B63\u5728\u5403\uFF1A" + food);
};
